articles.description: Fact-check: Indian cricketer Virat Kohli did call out English daily TOI for spreading fake news but TOI did not lose massive followers as claimed.
articles.content:
(Archives of similar claims can be seen here and here.)
What did Kohli post about TOI?: On 15 August, Kohli put up a screenshot of TOI's article on his Instagram story, where he mentioned how the ne… [+404 chars]
